name: Eddard "Ned" Stark
quotation: A loyal friend. The last one I've got.

name: Jaime Lannister
quotation: People have been swinging at me for years, but they always seem to miss.

name: Cersei Lannister
quotation: She has odd cravings, our sister.

name: Robert Baratheon
quotation: He'll do what he wants, which is all he's ever done.

name: Jon Snow
quotation: A bastard boy with nothing to inherit, off to serve in the ancient order of the Night's Watch.

name: Tyrion Lannister
quotation: Alas, I was born a Lannister of Casterly Rock. Things are expected of me.

name: Robb Stark
quotation: The boy has a certain belligerence.
